sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const OrderDetails = () => { const name = useSelector(state => state.auth.user) const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart.items) const {address,phoneNumber} = useSelector(state => state.ship.ShippingInfo) return (

Order # 4543f34f545

Shipping Info

Name: {name ? name.user.name : ''}

Phone:{phoneNumber}

Address:{address}

Amount: $ {cart.reduce((acc,item) => acc + item.quantity * item.price,0)}

Payment

PAID

Order Status:

Delivered

Order Items:

{cart.map(item => (
i.url)} alt="Laptop" height="45" width="65" />
{item.name}

${item.price}

{item.quantity} Piece(s)

))}
) } export default OrderDetails
